title: Chicken and broccoli puff pastry plait
ingredients: ['275g diced, cooked chicken meat', '100g fresh broccoli, chopped', '75g red pepper, chopped', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '110g grated Cheddar cheese', '8 tablespoons mayonnaise', '2 teaspoons dried dill', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons flaked almonds', '4 tablespoons diced onion', '1 (500g) packet shop-bought puff pastry', '1 egg white, beaten']
